== Blood smear ==
=> Activated mononuclear cells, characterised by a ''large size and hyperbasophilic cytoplasm = polymorphic cells, sometimes'' described as ''atypical'' = activated T lymphocytes.

=> Absence of blast cells

=> Other haematopoietic lineages are normal.

properties.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of a blood smear in mononucleosis syndrome?
properties.option_b: Large size and hyperbasophilic cytoplasm of polymorphic cells
properties.option_d: Decreased number of activated T lymphocytes
